data.text: ✈️The 2022 North Bund International Aviation Forum, themed “Sharing Opportunities of Digital Economy and Co-building a Green and Smart Civil Aviation” consists of greetings, keynote speeches, a roundtable forum, achievements release, etc. Stay tuned to the #CEAirOnAir. https://t.co/40c3fsewJK

🥢The dancing snowflakes decorate the world in white when #MinorSnow arrives. The greenery in winter is concealed in this dish! The beef is tender and flavorful, and the green peppers are sweet and crispy! Give it a try! #The24solarterms https://t.co/tI2KORUy5E

data.text: 🌉#CEAir looks forward to meeting U at the Waibaidu Bridge. Strolling along the busy Suzhou River and listening to the trickle of water is like walking from a noisy metropolis to a tranquil garden. Let's enjoy the greenery in the bustling city. https://t.co/dSgmeG0Tta

❤️#CEAir and the reps from Cultural tourism institutions, think tanks and enterprises discussed the important role of airline catering in the food #culture communication. Serving global travelers and telling stories about delicacies, EASTERN AIR CATERING warms hearts from tongue. https://t.co/fJEAicGM1D https://t.co/bSbWtvv5uw

data.text: On Nov. 17, a research report jointly completed by experts and young scholars from Nankai University, China, and Sant'Anna School of Advanced Studies-Pisa, Italy, was released in both Chinese🇨🇳 and Italian🇮🇹. https://t.co/kWXeknNhMe

🎶Stop for a while in the classical garden of #Suzhou, and the soft sounds of the #Kunqu Opera will linger in your ears. Its beauty lies not only in the stunning clothing but also in its artistic heritage. See how a #CEAir flight attendant performs this ancient art. https://t.co/9X69okXsgw

data.text: 🎼Ladies and gentlemen, welcome to #Suzhou, Jiangsu. The melodies hidden in traditional architecture have been converted into the Kunqu Opera performed by locals. Connect Hearts and Wonders, let's explore the charm of this ancient opera with #CEAir! https://t.co/Dh3ELeupV4

🌃Strolling through the light shades is like walking through the Milky Way. When it gets dark, the lights add a finishing touch to the ancient structures! Come to Hongyadong, China, and Ginzan Onsen, Japan, to enjoy the lively atmosphere with #CEAir! https://t.co/qAuUfmab2o

data.text: #CEAir looks forward to meeting U at the Bund, strolling among the magnificent complex, and beholding the Chinese-style cornice ceilings and Western-style stained glass. Let's enjoy #Shanghai's openness and inclusiveness. https://t.co/wlPJpyxvmZ

🌇The morning fog and sunrise greeted us on our journey
🌆while the night breeze and moonlights kept us company. 
✈️Fly to your destination with expectations and enthusiasm with #CEAir. https://t.co/vo5S5rBitq

✈️What do you think of when it comes to #Shanghai? #CEAir looks forwards to meeting U in Shanghai to appreciate the vibrant city and experience local culture. Follow CEAir to visit the various attractions in Shanghai! https://t.co/1XvRkJ5E12

🍵The new "skin" of MU Tea is OUT! 
☕️New look, but same rich fragrance. 
🔓Unlock the new flavor with #CEAir! https://t.co/emxPswcBmP

🫰🤘🖐️👏🫶🤙
Join #gesturedancechallenge issued by #CEAir's Lingyan flight attendant reception team and capture some fantastic #moments at the 5th #CIIE! @ciieonline https://t.co/pfbphgMA0v

🍀During this #CIIE, #CEAir signed 6️⃣ big orders with IAE AG, Rolls-Royce PLC, AFI KLM Engineering & Maintenance, Lufthansa Technik, Collins Aerospace and Satair PTE LTD, accounting for nearly 90% of the total contract value. 
▶️Watch the video to keep up with what's going on! https://t.co/YzVjxeAig6

data.text:
🍀Let's take a look at the "Expo Shopping Cart" of #CEAir! 
✅On the 1st day of the 5th #CIIE, CEAir and IAE AG signed a Fleet Hour Agreement (FHA) for V2500 engines. 
✈️CEAir plans to sign 15 purchase orders totalling more than $1.6 billion. https://t.co/RfnuBdIfTp

🍂The falling leaves and breeze reveal the arrival of autumn. 
❤️May you enjoy the cool atmosphere and treasure this moment. https://t.co/hP5GJayCzp

🍀With a sweet smile and professional performance, the #CEAir Lingyan flight attendant reception team has made a brilliant appearance at the National Exhibition and Convention Center. 
👀Let's look at the must-sees of #CIIE with them in the next few days! @ciieonline https://t.co/R0pz5DWLmg

🍀Only 1⃣ day left before the opening of #CIIE! @ciieonline 
🤳Let's selfie with "CIIE" elements around us! 
✈️Come with #CEAir to welcome the 5⃣th #CIIE. Are you ready for it? https://t.co/411NNouqqI

data.text: ✈️When going about your busy life, don't forget to look up at the colorful sky! Check out the enchanting scenery under the wings of #CEAir. Which one do you prefer? https://t.co/ZuD8d6CpWe

🚢🍜🍵Bringing #CEAir-style cuisine to #Antarctica! 
Chef from Eastern Air Catering boarded the #Xuelong polar research vessels with meals and catering products. This is the 22nd year in a row that Eastern Air Catering has provided catering services for the expedition team. https://t.co/lZoNXLMjy0

data.text: 🧑‍✈️Not only should a flight attendant of #CEAir have professional skills but also serve passengers with sincerity. Guess what they are busy doing? https://t.co/lJlat7PsT8

data.text: #ChinaInThePastDecade Practice intently, and showcase strikingly. How to obtain excellent skills? How to shine at the World Skills Competition? #ChinaInThePastDecade Just keep going forward to achieve what you yearn for regardless of the distance. How did French girl Lucine realize her dream in China? Lucine, a flight attendant of #CEAir, will show you her answer. #CEAirTalks https://t.co/lUJRLtwEj7

data.text:
✈️New Era, Shared Future. #CIIE @ciieonline
Only 1⃣0⃣ days left before the 5th China International Import Exhibition! 
Are you ready to explore cool exhibits from around the world with #CEAir? https://t.co/z75RPVzqTv

#ChinaInThePastDecade #ARJ100, ready for takeoff! Why is China's "Smart Manufacturing" "unstoppable"? Watch the video and find out with Diego, an Italian captain of #CEAir! #CEAirTalks https://t.co/2WWo9pBxqV

#ChinaInThePastDecade We share weal and woe in the same world. Captain Wang Xiaoyong of Eastern Air Logistics operated China's first all-cargo intercontinental charter flight to transport COVID-19 vaccines to Dominica. Check out the video and learn about his story. #CEAirTalks https://t.co/TKtxFJOnxF

data.text: #CEAirInThePastDecade Sweeter life with honey. #CEAir has set up the Bee Research Institute in Cangyuan to support the development of local industry. Research articles about black honey of Yunnan Cangyuan have even been published in a world-class academic journal. #CEAirInAction https://t.co/Wf1xGvM8v0

#CEAirInThePastDecade Free clinics hit the road. #CEAir organized medical experts from Shanghai to launch free clinic assistance campaigns in Cangyuan. The team carried out 100+ projects in education, medical care, housing renovation to improve infrastructure. #CEAirInAction https://t.co/wP30P87FzG

data.text: ✈️ A radio call connects air traffic controllers with pilots and trust is built up between them. Join the pilot of #CEAir on the #InternationalDayoftheAirTrafficController to learn more about the daily routine of the "guide" of our flights. https://t.co/Zfh843atKF

data.text: #CEAirInThePastDecade Fly toward Carbon Neutrality. On Oct. 2021, #CEAir used "China's first full-life-cycle carbon neutral oil" on 13 domestic routes and 780+ flights, inviting passengers to participate in carbon offset and completing 1 mil+ km of green flights. #CEAirInAction https://t.co/V6nlqN9ELv

#CEAirInThePastDecade New Equipment developing. To better serve PRMs, #CEAir developed new energy vehicles assisting boarding. In terms of green energy promotion, #CEAir has adopted 1,000+ new energy ground vehicles for flight support. #CEAirInAction https://t.co/orIuyF2BT4

🌄A picturesque landscape of mountains and rivers comes into view. In Dongchuan, Yunnan Province, China and Tuscany, Italy, each scene of #autumn is painted with various colors by nature! Check out these autumn postcards with #CEAir! https://t.co/riZPIyI64u

data.text: Through the ground-air high-speed network technology, #CEAir can deal with emergency efficiently in the air to safeguard our passengers’ health. #CEAirInAction

#CEAirInThePastDecade Fly with New Energy. In April 2013, an A320 plane of #CEAir successfully operated a verification flight using China self-developed SAF. #CEAir promoted the application of new energy and sustainable development of low-carbon flights in China. #CEAirInAction https://t.co/ax7TdsJEq3

#CEAirInThePastDecade Medical Team in the air. #CEAir has signed a cooperation agreement of "Air Medical Experts" with the Shanghai Medical Volunteer Union, and established a volunteer team with more than 120 air emergency medical experts from Shanghai. #CEAirInAction https://t.co/omsC28JWN2
🐼How about taking some COLORFUL pics of pandas at Chengdu Tianfu International Airport? Check with #CEAir to see how many #pandas there are in the following pictures. https://t.co/0Vh4z1cZoH

data.text: #CEAirInThePastDecade Guardians of life. In 2021, a #CEAir cargo plane carried COVID-19 vaccines arrived at Santo Domingo, Dominica. The flight took up 17hrs34mins across 15,988 km. CEAir helped building a high-speed and convenient corridor for epidemic prevention. #CEAirInAction https://t.co/f3qhwnxE5z

data.text: #CEAirInThePastDecade Front Line Fighters. On March 12, 2020, the first Chinese aid team took #CEAir flight from #Shanghai to #Rome with 9 medical experts and 13 tonnes of medical supplies. Heroes in harm's way, #CEAir helps to builds the “Life Pathway in the Air”. #CEAirInAction https://t.co/h9tY5osZMk

#CEAirInThePastDecade CEAir has established a new partnership. China Eastern Airlines and the Lingang New Area have signed a strategic cooperation agreement to build an aviation hub. The total investment of this project exceeds 22 billion RMB (3.1 billion USD). #CEAirInProgress https://t.co/dlmA7IFDm7

data.text: #CEAirInThePastDecade CEAir helps you stay “connected”. Through the 6D satellite, our passengers can enjoy a high-speed internet service up to more than 220Mbps during flight. #CEAir has upgraded our in-flight internet for a more flyer-friendly experience. #CEAirInProgress https://t.co/9VmnIHtD57

🌅The crystal lake in the mountains looks like a mirror up in the clouds! The beautiful sceneries of #Tianchi Lake of Changbai Mountain in China and Lake Königssee in #Germany will make your day. #CEAir wants to share this beauty with you, check it out! https://t.co/HXbi7MrVPm
🤖This CUTE "clerk" is waiting for you at #Beijing Daxing International Airport! Just ask him, if you need help! https://t.co/VetFhwxu69
